Hello. I'm having a security issue with a person who  

has a Blog and my name is being used in an abusive manner on her blog.
I've  
emailed her twice to have her remove the false comments on her blog about 

me. When you google my name "michael pernicci" it shows up my name on this
 
blog! The blog is MY LIFE OF CRIME-Can you please fix this in your system 

to where when you google my name "michael pernicci" it won't show up on
her  
blog-My Life Of Crime. I'm an innocent bi-standard in this tragic
situation  
and have nothing to do with the issue at hand. The comments are slander,  

defamation of my character, hurtful, and false. Thank you for you support 

and help with this situation! Please help me fix this horrible problem!
